name: CbcDummyBranchingObject
brief: No-op branching object for special cases

algorithms.name:
Placeholder One-Way Branch (No-Op)
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcDummyBranchingObject: A placeholder branch that does nothing.
Used when the branching framework requires a branching object
but no actual branching action is needed.

Use cases:
- Continue tree exploration when LP appears feasible but isn't
- Placeholder for deferred branching decisions
- Testing and debugging the branching infrastructure

The branch() method returns immediately without modifying bounds.

see:
CbcBranchingObject for base class

Edwin 11/10/2009 carved out of CbcBranchActual
